title: Congress mocks PM over Rupee fall, Swiss deposits
article_body: NEW DELHI: Congress on Friday slammed the Modi government over the fall in value of rupee and the rise in Indian deposits in Swiss banks, saying the two developments exposed the “lies” of the BJP regime that UPA was corrupt and it would cleanse the system. Targeting Modi, Congress president tweeted, “In 2014, he said: I will bring back all the ‘black’ money in Swiss banks and put Rs 15 lakh in each account. In 2016, he said: Demonetisation will cure India of ‘black’ money. In 2018, he says: 50% jump in Swiss deposits by Indians is ‘white’ money. No ‘black’ in Swiss banks!”   Congress spokesman RPN Singh said BJP had been the worst performer on the economic front as the rupee had touched its lowest mark in 2018 while the 50% rise in deposits in Swiss banks this year was the second highest ever. It was the highest at 56% in 2004.
